name: SetBusinessServicePriority
description:
Set the priority threshold for a business service.

Use this tool to update the account-level priority threshold for a business service. Requires the 'services.write' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: The versioning header for the API request. Specify the API version to use.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: global_priority_threshold
parameters.description: JSON object to set the `id` and `order` for the global Priority Threshold. Obtain values via `/priorities` endpoint. Incidents at or above this level impact Business Services unless directly added to an incident.

value_schema.description:
Set the `id` and `order` of the global Priority Threshold. These values can be obtained by calling the `/priorities` endpoint.

Once set, Incidents must be at or above the specified level in order to impact Business Services.  An exception to this rule is if the Incident has been added to the incident directly using the `PUT /incidents/{id}/business_services/{business_service_id}/impacts` endpoint.
